gov.sandia.rbb.ui
Class MPlayerReplayClient

java.lang.Object
  gov.sandia.rbb.ui.MPlayerReplayClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
RBBReplayControl.Listener
public class MPlayerReplayClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements RBBReplayControl.Listener

Control mplayer via ReplayControl. A big limitation of this class is that mplayer does not act as a controller - if the user hits the keys to move in time, the ReplayControl will NOT be notified.

waitForMPlayerToExit

getDuration

public java.lang.Long getDuration()
                           throws java.io.IOException
Get the duration, in milliseconds, of the currently playing file. This is synchronized so it won't return garbage before initialize() (which is run in a separate thread) is done.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

Specified by:
replayControl in interface RBBReplayControl.Listener

destroy

public void destroy()
Stop mplayer at any time. This doesn't need to be called for cleanup if mplayer has already exited.
